mods.abstract: Three color window card (black, light blue, and purple on beige) announcing the 4th Annual Nashville River Stages featuring the Black Crowes, Blues Traveler, Bob Dylan, Cheap Trick, Crazy Town, The Cult, Dickey Betts Band, Duncan Sheik, Evan and Jaron, John Prine, Lucinda Williams, Steve Earle, String Cheese Incident, Train, Wallflowers, Alisa Carroll, Angie Apato, Antonia, Asbestos, Barely Heroes, Brooks Tucker, Benjamins, David Olney, Dexter Freebish, Doughty, Emma Grandillo, Femi Kuti, Fentix, TX, Fisher, Five For Fighting, Freshwater Collins, Gabe Dixon Band, The General, Hayseed Dixie, Holly Williams, Homemade Water, Hugg, JBender, J. Ivy, Jack Pearson and William Howse, Jason White, Joe 90, John Mayer, Joni Wilson, Josh Joplin Group, Kort and Beth, Llama, luvjOi, Mark Luna, Meredith Edwards, Mike Plume, The Muddogs, O.A.R, Pat McGee Band, Paul Thorn, Plaster, Quin Loggins, Ron LaSalle, Soup, Stardevils, Steve Poltz, Tantric, Todd Snider, and Trucken in downtown Nashville, Tennessee on May 4-6.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
